name: Arc'teryx Conveyor Belt - Unisex
description: Anchor your favourite pants in place with this rugged versatile belt. The infinitely adjustable buckle means you define your waistline, not a pre-set hole.One-piece aluminum buckle allows for precise micro-adjustments.Buckle features a laser-etched Arc’teryx logo.Friction patch under the buckle prevents slippage.Riveted thermoplastic tip allows for easy threading and eliminates the risk of fraying.Contrasting stitch detailing adds and eye-catching contrast.
